name: jetpack thingy
description:
How 2 Play:
- WASD or joystick to move
- Space to jetpack
- Click to activate/deactivate a magnet

This game is botched and there are are only 2 playable levels (and 2 sandbox levels) and hgghjdsgj but this game is meant to be low effort, because it's for the Low Effor Jam!
